name: Elude (itch)
description:
"It's been 8 years since the rise of the Robotic Allegiance. I've somehow found myself outside the city. Is this my chance? Will I finally be able to see my daughter again?" 

Elude is a first-person exploration game about a father trying to reunite with his daughter. After finding himself outside of the Robotic Allegiance city, he believes that the reunion may happen soon. He must scour the outer city limits in search of terminals to open the gates of the Human Resistance Capitol. Easy right? Wrong. The Robotic Allegiance will soon be looking for him. Can he make it to the capitol before he is caught?

Follow me on Twitter for future games! - https://twitter.com/LegenDerry9

Use WASD to move

Use the Mouse to look around

Hold Shift to run

Use the Spacebar to jump
